Case 1:19-cr-00490-RMB Document 27 Filed 07/17/19 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK

UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

v.

JEFFREY EPSTEIN,

Defendant.

NOTICE OF APPEARANCE

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that Michael C. Miller, a member in good standing of the Bar of this Court and a member of the law firm Steptoe & Johnson LLP, hereby enters his appearance as counsel of record for Defendant Jeffrey Epstein, in the above-captioned action.

Dated: New York, New York
July 17, 2019

Respectfully submitted,

By: /s/ Michael C. Miller
Michael C. Miller
STEPTOE & JOHNSON LLP
1114 Avenue of the Americas
New York, NY 10036
Tel: (212) 506-3900
Fax: (212) 506-3950
E-mail: miller@steptoe.com

Counsel for Defendant
Jeffrey Epstein

DOJ-OGR-00000467
